title: Applications for the Royal Society Pairing Scheme are now open

content.text: Do you want to have the opportunity to:
Then the Royal Society Pairing Scheme is for you!
This annual scheme pairs UK Civil Servants with a talented UK based research scientist for a week in Westminster in March 2023.

The week is aimed at Civil Servants, particularly policy makers, at grade HEO and above across government and includes a program of sessions and workshops to learn more about the processes of parliament and the science research and advice landscape. You will be paired with a researcher related to your policy area.

This scheme is an opportunity to use your allocated learning and development days.
To register your interest and receive a short application form please email gse@go-science.gov.uk.
